name: LightForm (itch)
description:
Controls: Controller (recommended!),  A,S,D,Space (not so recommended, but it works).

This is my submission for Black and White Jam #8. This was my first game jam, and this project is actually the first thing I've ever shared with people publicly. It's best played with a controller, I hope that doesn't deter too many people. I had so many ideas that I wasn't able to get into this game before the jams time limit. Even as I submit this I see things I wish I had a little more time to change, but over all, I'm really just happy I was able to finish something and share it with people. 

All assets were made by me during the jam.
